summary: Heavy metal, or just metal, is a type of rock music that started in the late 1960s and early 1970s in the UK and the US. It has a powerful sound with loud, distorted guitars and strong beats. Bands like Led Zeppelin and Black Sabbath are pioneers. In the 1970s, American bands like Van Halen and Aerosmith made it more popular. Over time, metal has changed, with different styles like thrash and death metal. It has fans called "metalheads" and is known for its intense lyrics.
title: Heavy metal music
